name: nonporous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Something that is nonporous does not allow liquid or air to pass through it: Lay the sheet on a nonporous surface until it is dry. I always keep my spices in non-porous glass containers. Related word
porous
More examplesFewer examplesFill in any gaps with a nonporous material.The water cannot escape from the non-porous concrete bowl.The nonporous enamel surface makes it easy to wash.They are made from a non-porous substance, so they won't become stained when food is stored in them.
